poem:
Title: In Mourning and Metal

In the chill heart of Russia, bruised to blue
Sings the dirge for Navalny, scarlet hue,
Protest's fierce anthem blooms, and hope anew,
Phantoms of freedom brave the beast's dark view.
Two hundred voices hushed, yet rising through,
Carried on the iron wind where tyrants rue,
And the whisper of change, in veins coldly drew,
A valorous truth, the root in winter's strew.
